name: Freshwater  Creative
tag_list: graphic-design, branding, cincinnati, ohio, consulting, identity, web-design, print, package-design, seo, social-media-marketing
overview:
Whether you are a Fortune 500 company or a small upstart, success come from the way you brand and market your company and your products. It also comes from the team that you choose to help you.

At Freshwater, we believe that you don’t have to be a big fish to stand out in a large pond. You do, however, have to employ fresh ideas to make a splash big enough to create a noticeable ripple in your marketplace.

It is our goal to become your indispensable design and brand management partner. We strive for long term business partnerships. At Freshwater, we work diligently to understand your industry, your competition, and your unique needs, so that we may proactively support you in your on-going efforts to creatively and effectively market your company and it’s products.

Whether your fighting the recession or just fighting the bland, we invite you to contact us, introduce yourself, and tell us about your needs. We look forward to speaking with you. Services and Specialties How can we help?

We will design a service package that is tailored to meet your unique needs.
